alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Millard County through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Kanosh, or 22 miles southwest of Fillmore, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Millard County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties
